name.description:
The name of the person in the avatar.

- if `src` has loaded, the name will be used as the `alt` attribute of the `img`
- If `src` is not loaded, the name will be used to create the initials
name.name: name

presence.description:
The presence status of the person

If set will add an AvatarBadge with color configured in `Presence`
Default presence options:
- online
- offline
- busy
- dnd
- away
presence.name: presence

presenceLabel.description:
The textual presence status of the person.
Online, Offline, Busy, Do-not-disturb or Away
presenceLabel.name: presenceLabel

presenceIcon.description: The icon shown in the AvatarBadge
presenceIcon.name: presenceIcon

badgeSize.description: The badge size. Defaults to 1em. Use em value to keep the size relative to the avatar.
badgeSize.name: badgeSize

isOutOfOffice.description: Indicates that a person is out of office. Changes the presence badge style.
isOutOfOffice.name: isOutOfOffice
